reviewText: Very useful in viewing the early work of an auteur. Having seen some of his more recent work (And though throughly enjoying it), I was curious to trace Sorrentino's earlier work. I can say that I was properly satisfied and and ejigoyed it throughout. It must be noted that it's a region B DVD, and that you will need a multi regional DVD player to watch it.
We can't watch these movies because this version of dvd is not compatible with the units sold in New York
